title: hexo_test

code span test
斜体测试
数学测试：

代码段测试
#include <stdio.c>int main(){    printf("hallo world!");    return 0;}
module ( input clk, input rstn, output sig )reg sig1;always @(posedge clk) begin    if(!rstn) begin        sig1 <= 1'b0;    end else         sig1 <= sig1;endassign sig = sig1;endmodule
